title: BRIEF-Care.com Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.32
text: 22 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Care.com Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.32 Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Care.com Inc: * CARE.COM ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19 * Q4 REVENUE $44.2 MILLION * SEES Q1 REVENUE $46.5 MILLION - $47.0 MILLION * SEES Q1 NON-GAAP EPS ABOUT $0.13 * SEES 2018 REVENUE $190.0 MILLION - $191.0 MILLION * SEES 2018 NON-GAAP EPS $0.63 - $0.65 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13, REVENUE VIEW $47.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.63, REVENUE VIEW $190.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.17, REVENUE VIEW $44.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
